name: The Prime Minister of Silly Walks
name_original: The Prime Minister of Silly Walks
description:
Become the leader an international superpower. Try to stay elected - and alive!

The United States of Silly Walks have just elected a new leader, and it's you! Try to gain intelligence from foreign countries, solve ancient mysteries, and advance your imperialistic goals!

Features:

  • 9 Different styles of walk to choose from
  • Travel to foreign countries
  • 3 Different Endings
  • Cinematic Cutscenes

Made over 9 days for the 2020 'So Bad it's Good' Jam. The theme this year was "impossible". Story, design, voices, programming, models, and animations were all made during the Jam period.
